title: Break Free
description: NEW MYSTERIOUS ROMANCE FROM BESTSELLING AUTHOR AMBER GARZA...Jade Mathews is on the run. Running from an addiction that almost destroyed her, and a man who wants her dead.Kyler James is a writer, a recluse locked in a prison of his own making.When Jade and Kyler meet they find solace in one another and start to heal. Until Jade stumbles upon Kyler's latest manuscript and is shocked to find that it is her story. One he couldn't know. Jade fears she's trusted the wrong person once again, and this time it may be her undoing.Is the past destined to destroy them, or will they finally break free?
author: Amber Garza
